parts.title: Part 1: Match the Root/Prefix/Suffix to Its Meaning

questions.meaning: Suffix meaning pertaining to or related to.
Suffix meaning study of or branch of knowledge.
Suffix indicating a process, action, or state.

parts.title: Part 2: Use the Root/Prefix/Suffix to Guess the Word

questions.definition: Excessively active, often beyond the usual or healthy level.
A device for viewing images from a distance.
An explosive material that uses force (power) to detonate.
Relating to the generation of electricity through the movement of water.
The branch of science concerned with the nature and properties of matter and energy.
The detailed examination of the elements or structure of something.
Characterized by constant change or activity.
The branch of science concerned with the behavior of water in motion.

questions.question: Write a sentence using one HYPER word, one TELE word, and one -ICS word.
questions.example: The hyperactive child watched the dynamic action scene on the television, fascinated by the energy of the characters.

questions.question: Can you think of another word with one of the parts? Guess what it might mean.
questions.example: Hydrology might mean the study of water systems, as 'hydro' relates to water and 'logy' means study of.
